property.name: border
property.description: The border around the tree including header.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the tree should have a border.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies to disabled trees.

state.name: selected
state.description: When the tree item is selected

state.name: unfocused
state.description: When the focus is not on the tree

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies to the items of a disabled tree.

state.name: hover
state.description: Mouse over state.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for tree column headers

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for tree column headers.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: Border for the bottom line of tree columns headers.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for the content of tree columns headers.

state.name: hover
state.description: Mouse over state

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies to column headers of a disabled tree.

element.name: TreeColumn-SortIndicator
element.description: Sort indicators in Tree column headers

state.name: up
state.description: On sorting up

state.name: down
state.description: On sorting down

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the tree is disabled.

property.name: color
property.description: Grid line color when linesVisible is true

state.name: vertical
state.description: Applies for vertical grid lines.

state.name: horizontal
state.description: Applies for horizontal grid lines.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the tree checkbox. The size of the image should be 13 x 13 pixels.

state.name: grayed
state.description: When tree checkbox is grayed

state.name: checked
state.description: When tree checkbox is checked

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over a tree check box.

element.name: Tree-Indent
element.description: The area freed by indenting an item for one level.

property.name: width
property.description: The indention-width of one level. This property can not be influenced by the states of the element.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the indention. It is centered within the available area, defined by the "width"-property and the height of the item. The overflow is not visible.

state.name: line
state.description: Indicates that the level continues after this item. Never used for the final level and therefore never combined with the other states.

state.name: first
state.description: Used for the final level if the item has no previous sibling.

state.name: last
state.description: Used for the final level if the item has no next sibling.

state.name: collapsed
state.description: Used for the final level if the item has children.

state.name: expanded
state.description: Used for the final level if the item is expanded

state.name: hover
state.description: Mouse over state. Can not be used together with line.
